## Call.Issue enum

An enumeration of call issues that can be reported.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enum Issue 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  AudioLatency | <code>&quot;audio-latency&quot;</code> | The call encountered significant audio latency. |
|  ChoppyAudio | <code>&quot;choppy-audio&quot;</code> | Call audio was choppy. |
|  DroppedCall | <code>&quot;dropped-call&quot;</code> | The call was dropped unexpectedly. |
|  Echo | <code>&quot;echo&quot;</code> | Call audio had significant echo. |
|  NoisyCall | <code>&quot;noisy-call&quot;</code> | Call audio had significant noise. |
|  NotReported | <code>&quot;not-reported&quot;</code> | No issue is reported. |
|  OneWayAudio | <code>&quot;one-way-audio&quot;</code> | One party of the call could not hear the other callee. |
